metadata.name: KT-DR1
metadata.description:
‘KT-DR1’ is a collaborative work pairing Keith Tucker’s audio with Damien Roach’s visuals. Taking Tucker’s otherworldly, futuristic sonics and its roots in the optimistic stargazing of Detroit Techno as a starting point, Roach’s imagery takes us on a 3 minute animated journey he calls ‘Abstract Sci-Fi’.  He describes the work as ‘hacking the aesthetic architecture of cinematic science fiction, like lens flares, chrome, and prismatic lighting, and rerouting it towards a dreamlike, non-narrative form’. ‘KT-DR1’ connects the dots between these two artists' practices in a futuristic, transatlantic, cross-generational first. 


Visuals: Damien Roach
Audio: Keith Tucker
Title: KT-DR1
Date: 2022
Format: MP4 
Dimensions: 640 x 360 px
Dimensions of full spec file: 1920 x 1080 px
Duration: 3:00
Unique Edition 1/1

The owner will be able to receive the MP4 with full spec encoding. This is the purchase benefit only for the primary sale.
